target: 但是踢球有时会很艰难。

source: "In the coming months, we will consult on introducing a complete ban on the advertising and promotion of vapour products."
target: “在未来几个月，我们将就全面禁止雾化产品的广告和促销进行磋商。”

source: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
target: 一名腰缠万贯的旅客可能会考虑乘飞机环游世界，并在旅途中陆续入住许多家这样的酒店。

source: This is the second institution of higher learning jointly established by a US$130 million donation by the Li Ka Shing Foundation. With effect from next year, the Foundation will commit another RMB2 billion to build Shantou University.
target: 该校为李嘉诚基金会捐资1.3亿美元合作筹建的第二所高校，而李嘉诚基金会明年起将再投资20亿元(人民币，下同)建设汕头大学。

source: The 25th Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Economic Leaders' Meeting was held in the central Vietnam city of Da Nang from the 10th to 11th. The progress of the Free Trade Area of the Asia-Pacific (FTAAP) will be one of the highlights of this meeting.
target: 亚太经合组织（ＡＰＥＣ）第二十五次领导人非正式会议将于１０日至１１日在越南中部城市岘港举行，亚太自贸区（ＦＴＡＡＰ）进程是此次会议讨论的热点之一。
